_sText:
You can create curling pucks of different colors for the game.
Additionally, you can adjust the force of the shot using the buttons located on the field.
You also have the option to clear the entire field of pucks by pressing the white button, while pressing the black button will generate obstacles.

Furthermore, I recommend enabling the following settings for a more comfortable gameplay experience:

sv_turbophysics 1
sv_pushaway_force 1000

My by: energetic_time!

This map was made for centralka css

Discord server: https://centralka.ru/discord
